Lun2 dun1 Da4 xue2 Xue2 yuan4

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音機能收聽到倫敦的電臺嗎？
倫敦的臺爾森銀行麼，先生？

sentences.english: Dr Mae-wan Ho, Institute of Science in Society, London, UK.
sentences.chinese: 何美芸博士，社會科學研究院，倫敦，英國。

sentences.english: The reading room of the British Library, UK.
sentences.chinese: 大英圖書館中央閱讀室，倫敦。

sentences.english: and you have a lot of Africans in London.
sentences.chinese: 在倫敦，你能見到很多非洲人。

sentences.english: They rented a small house in London.
sentences.chinese: 他們在倫敦租了一套小房子。

sentences.english: The movie is set in pre-war London.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影以戰前倫敦爲背景。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, just a quarter of auditors moving to in-house roles in the City are women.
sentences.chinese: 同時，倫敦城內四分之一改爲坐班的審計師爲女性。

sentences.english: Walk around Richmond, the American International University in London.
sentences.chinese: 里士滿倫敦美國國際大學校園行。

sentences.english: Excuse me. What's the time difference betweeen Beijing and London?
sentences.chinese: 請問北京和倫敦的時差是多少？

sentences.english: Hours and hours I've spent pasting their bloody rot all over London.
sentences.chinese: 成天價在倫敦貼他們的那些死爛貨。

sentences.english: Dianna is leaving for London tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 戴安娜明天將動身去倫敦。

sentences.english: Another will run two miles from Elephant and Castle in the south to Farringdon in north London.
sentences.chinese: 另一條從南邊的象堡到北倫敦的法靈頓，延伸兩英里。

sentences.english: The bins will be installed in central London and Liverpool in October.
sentences.chinese: 十月份，這種垃圾桶將被安裝在倫敦市中心和利物浦。

sentences.english: In more recent years he worked on London market stalls.
sentences.chinese: 最近幾年，他曾在倫敦一座市場上工作。

sentences.english: Did you come to London to see your family or for business purposes?
sentences.chinese: 你來倫敦是看望家人還是公幹？
